summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DigiKawsay Phase 4 RunaMap implementation. All backend Network Analysis APIs are working correctly (95.5% success rate). Frontend RunaMap page loads properly with React Flow visualization, D3-force layout, and all required UI components. Navigation and access control working as expected.

design_issues.issue: Page title in h1 shows 'DigiKawsay' instead of 'RunaMap'

passed_tests: All 6 RunaMap Network Analysis APIs working correctly
RunaMap page loads correctly at /network route
Filter controls for Participante↔Tema, Tema↔Tema, Participante↔Participante
Generate Network and Save Snapshot buttons functional
Top Brokers panel with betweenness centrality
Proper 'No data' state when no network data available
Navigation link in sidebar working for admin users
Access control restricting RunaMap to admin/facilitator/analyst roles
Campaign selection and network generation workflow

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (RunaMap functionality working, minor UI title issue)
